p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:14pt; font-weight:600; color:#00aa00;

p.span: Hi there! My name is Alexander Furmanov (GRUB_666), I am the only developer of this program, and therefore I can afford a separate subsection in the documentation. I really hope you enjoy my program if you don't like it already. I tried very hard to make it quality, applying to this maximum of their efforts, however, from errors no one can be insured, so if you find some error or you think that the program does not work correctly, please let me know (contacts are provided below), it is desirable in the message to specify information about the operating system or any other information about your PC that you deem necessary.
(If you want to get more information about me, write, I will be glad to answer)

p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:10pt; color:#00aa00;

p.span: Good luck, happiness and joy to you!
